normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics**

unnormalised: Hey fam! Wanna know if your Insta game is actually attracting *real* followers, or just bots from Borivali? Follower analytics are your secret weapon!
normalised: Hey fam! Wanna know if your Insta game is actually attracting *real* followers, or just bots from Borivali? Follower analytics are your secret weapon!

unnormalised: Seriously, ditch the chai-guessing and dive into the data. These tools break down who’s actually double-tapping your reels – age, location (even if they're chilling in Chennai!), interests…the whole shebang.
normalised: Seriously, ditch the chai-guessing and dive into the data. These tools break down who's actually double-tapping your reels – age, location (even if they're chilling in Chennai!), interests…the whole shebang.

unnormalised: Why bother? Well, imagine crafting a campaign for Diwali sweets, only to realize most of your followers are fitness freaks from Kerala! Analytics help you target the right audience, saving you Rs. and boosting engagement.
normalised: Why bother? Well, imagine crafting a campaign for Diwali sweets, only to realize most of your followers are fitness freaks from Kerala! Analytics help you target the right audience, saving you rupees and boosting engagement.

unnormalised: Think of it as figuring out the secret recipe to your influencer marketing biryani. You wouldn't just randomly throw ingredients in, right?
normalised: Think of it as figuring out the secret recipe to your influencer marketing biryani. You wouldn't just randomly throw ingredients in, right?

unnormalised: Platforms like SocialPilot and even good ol' Instagram Insights offer decent free options. Premium tools give you even deeper dives, tracking follower growth since 26/01/1950, unfollows, and even potential fake accounts.
normalised: Platforms like SocialPilot and even good old Instagram Insights offer decent free options. Premium tools give you even deeper dives, tracking follower growth since twenty-sixth january nineteen fifty, unfollows, and even potential fake accounts.

unnormalised: Pro tip: Watch out for sudden follower spikes, especially around 14:00 hrs. Could be bots! Regularly check your analytics, say, every Friday at 09:00 hrs, to stay ahead.
normalised: Pro tip: Watch out for sudden follower spikes, especially around two p.m. Could be bots! Regularly check your analytics, say, every Friday at nine a.m., to stay ahead.

unnormalised: Happy analyzing! You'll be the King/Queen of content in no time!
normalised: Happy analyzing! You'll be the King or Queen of content in no time!
